properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 7 at 8:57AM PST until February 9 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 16 to 21 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 8 to 11 feet.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM Saturday to 9 AM PST
Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY
